channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Kaoss Pad V is the first major upgrade to Korg’s touch-based effects in 13 years
item.description: The Kaoss Pad has seen many different iterations, but the mainline effect unit and sampler hasn't received an update since the launch of the KP3+ in 2013. Korg has finally given it the attention it deserves with the release of the Kaoss Pad V. Rather than a dramatic reimagining of what a Kaoss Pad is, […]

item.title: 'Sharp, irreversible hikes': Think RAM price surges are bad? Analysts say AI will cause SSDs' NAND components to shoot up in price permanently - with no ceiling in sight
item.description: TrendForce forecasts suggest NAND pricing pressures are structural, supported by constrained supply and sustained SSD demand from data centers.

item.title: Why Coinbase derailed the crypto industry’s political future
item.description: January was going to be a landmark month for the crypto industry. The Senate would start negotiating the finer details of the CLARITY Act, a major law that would finally enshrine the fundamental structure of how the crypto market could legally operate in the United States: what digital assets counted as a security versus a […]

item.title: The SwitchBot Smart Video Doorbell Is a Smart Home Camera for Almost Nobody
item.description: SwitchBot’s new video doorbell shines in a couple of ways, but fails hard in too many key smart home camera ways.

item.title: Under Musk, the Grok disaster was inevitable
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on dystopian developments in AI, follow Hayden Field. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started You could say it all started with Elon Musk's AI […]

item.title: Cette marque européenne veut s’imposer en France avec un argument béton pour remplacer vos AirTags et SmartTags
item.description: Chipolo est une marque européenne qui fait concurrence aux AirTags et SmartTags. Or, elle est la seule à proposer des balises compatibles avec les réseaux d'Apple et de Google et compte s'imposer durablement en France.

item.title: La pression monte pour la Nasa : la Station spatiale touche à sa fin et le relais n’est pas assuré
item.description: Comment feront les agences spatiales et leurs astronautes quand la Station spatiale internationale ne sera plus ? L'échéance approche mais aucun plan ne semble vraiment se détacher, au point que des sénateurs américains demandent à la Nasa d'agir, et d'agir vite.

item.title: L’endurante et élégante Huawei GT6 Pro débarque pour les soldes avec un code promo, des écouteurs et un bracelet en cadeau
item.description: Avec un magnifique écran, une batterie endurante et des capteurs précis, la GT6 Pro de Huawei est une tocante prête à affronter toutes les sessions sportives avec style. Pour les soldes, un coupon fait passer son prix de 379 euros à 319 euros avec deux cadeaux à la clé, dont les FreeBuds 6i d'une valeur de 69,99 euros sur le site de Huawei.

item.title: The answer to AI in music isn’t suppression. It’s data
item.description: Like it or not, AI music is here to stay. Rather than fighting it, we should understand its benefits as a tool for artists. When the NFL and Apple Music announced Bad Bunny as the 2026 Super Bowl half-time show headliner, the choice surprised some. But to anyone tracking the data over the past few years, it was inevitable. In 2022, Bad Bunny’s Un Verano Sin Ti redefined the market, driving Latin music’s streaming growth to new heights. It later became the first Spanish-language album nominated for Grammy Album of the Year. The takeaway is simple: When you have accurate, real-time data, you don...

item.title: Is Urine the Next Wellness Tracker? I Used Withings’ U-Scan to Find Out
item.description: I’m not sure it's worth the coveted space in my toilet bowl.

item.title: 15 Best Electric Bikes (2026), Tested and Reviewed: Commuting, Mountain Biking
item.description: We tested the best electric bikes in every category, from commuters and mountain bikes to foldables and cruisers.

item.title: I review 4K Blu-ray for a living and these 6 discs show what 4K can do for classic movies
item.description: I've picked six of my favorite 4K Blu-rays that show off the benefits of 4K restoration for classic movies.

item.title: The world’s most iconic pen is now a giant lamp
item.description: You’ve never seen a Bic Cristal like this before. Almost everywhere you go, from the doctor’s office to the library to the car dealership, there’s one ubiquitous design gem hidden in plain sight: the Bic Cristal.
